actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to consolidate the intermingled public lands between Farmington and Gallup, New Mexico.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior and the Navajo Tribe to exchange specified lands in New Mexico. Reserves to third parties any mineral or other interest such parties held in such lands prior to such exchange. Requires access to any adjacent private, State, or Federal lands to be maintained.

titles.title: A bill to consolidate the intermingled public lands between Farmington and Gallup, New Mexico.
